turkish_example_sentence: O küçük bir dükkânda çalışmasa ailesi finansal sorunlar yaşar.
english_example_sentence: If she were not to work at a small shop, her family would face financial problems.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы она не работала в маленьком магазине, её семья столкнулась бы с финансовыми проблемами.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O küçük bir dükkânda ______ ailesi finansal sorunlar yaşar.
